original_title: Rugrats: Tales from the Crib: Three Jacks & A Beanstalk
overview: Aunt Moo, a kindly old cow, and her Children (The Rugrats) are given a bag of magical beans by a mysterious stranger. This stranger (Susie) turns out to be a magic fairy, and the beans they threw out the window grow into a gigantic beanstalk.
title: Rugrats: Tales from the Crib: Three Jacks & A Beanstalk
